title: Riot Balance Team pls.
body: So our crocodile Renekton got a upgrade lets say now if you push him lest say he takes half of your hp and the only thing you can do is build armor,but when i am playing lest say irelia who need infinity to do anything how can i counter him from killing me by even watching me , how you say he will e a minion and jump on me stun me for like 3 secs and i am dead and above that he has fury so he deals more damage.I may be overeacting but i am pretty sure you cant counter renekton with a bruiser that needs damage.i mean my solution is lower the stun its like ashes arrow but with a way lower couldown. Everything else is fine and balnced, i know some people may say 'Just dont attack him in the early game.' but he can just freeze the lane if he is good enough.{{champion:58}}

replies.body: You have a 30%winrate with irelia, you're the problem, not the renekton.

Renekton's stun is only 0.75/1.50.
Renekton have hard time freezing due to all his aoe.
Renekton is ment to be strong early as he scales poorly, Irelia is a scaling chamption and should lose to him early.
Renekton is pretty weak and has been for a while, Riot is not gonna nerf him, they might even buff him.
